name: Roll The Dice [Chapter 1]
description:
It's a story horror game that follows the story of a gambler that goes through the horrors and terror of the unexpected events just by rolling a dice, will they reach the end? or fall into despair and stay in the never-ending loop of being hunted by it.

What's the future of this game? - well I look forward to polish it since there isn't really much content at the moment, this was for the 48h GMTK Game Jam 2022,  you can expect more content of this game in the future! content such as: renewed animations, more detailed scenarios, some puzzles, more chapters, overall more content for sure.

What can I do so far? - first challenge is to find all the candles, interact with them, that'll open the exit door,  after that the next challenge is to interact with all the grandfather clocks which open the exit door.

When will there be more updates? - once GMTK Game Jam 2022 is over.
